events.title: Introduction to Test Automation
events.speaker: John Doe
events.description: A comprehensive workshop on getting started with test automation using Selenium and Python.

events.title: Mobile Testing Best Practices
events.speaker: Jane Smith
events.description: Learn the best practices for mobile app testing on iOS and Android platforms.

events.title: AI in Software Testing Panel
events.speaker: Multiple Speakers
events.description: Industry experts discuss the impact of AI and machine learning on software testing.

events.title: API Testing with Postman
events.speaker: Mike Chen
events.description: Hands-on workshop covering API testing strategies and Postman automation.

events.title: Performance Testing Fundamentals
events.speaker: Sarah Lee
events.description: Understanding performance testing concepts and tools like JMeter and K6.

events.title: CI/CD for Test Automation
events.speaker: David Kumar
events.description: Integrating automated tests into CI/CD pipelines with Jenkins and GitHub Actions.
